title: Cartography Compositor Pipeline
description: Defines preset pipelines for applying compositor rules to a chart or satellite.

type.description: Defines the type of base image to use. A pipeline with a type of 'None' will start off with a solid color.

name.description: Display name of this pipleine as it will show in-game.

output_file.description: Absolute or relative (to this file) path where the composited image will be placed.

auto_open.description: When set to 'true', the file will be opened immediately after compositing finishes.

time.description: The world time to set the game to before rendering. This is a standard time string separated by a colon.

background_color.description: When 'type' is 'None', this color fills the image before compositing starts.

chart_color_provider.description: Defines the chart color provider to use. Value should be a C# type name like 'BundledStripChartColorProvider' or 'JsonChartColorProvider'.

anyOf.description: A chart color provider type. should be a C# type name like 'BundledStripChartColorProvider' or 'JsonChartColorProvider'.
A color provider type. should be a C# type name like 'BundledStripChartColorProvider' or 'JsonChartColorProvider'.

compositors.description: Provides an ordered list of compositors to apply. The fist elements will be applied on top of lower ones (they are applied in reverse). Values should be a C# type name like 'OverlayCartographyCompositor'. Some compositors may take additional config in which an object with a 'type' property can be used instead.

anyOf.description: A compositor type. This should be a C# type name like 'OverlayCartographyCompositor'.

chart_type_overrides.description: Override the chart type for specific objects or resources.
